titleStmt.title: A Non-parametric Multi-Scale Statistical Model for Natural Images

affiliation.orgName: Artificial Intelligence Laboratory Learning & Vision Group 545 Technology Square
Artificial Intelligence Laboratory Learning & Vision Group 545 Technology Square

analytic.title: A Non-parametric Multi-Scale Statistical Model for Natural Images

abstract.p: The observed distribution of natural images is far from uniform. On the contrary, real images have complex and important structure that can be exploited for image processing, recognition and analysis. There have been many proposed approaches to the prin-cipled statistical modeling of images, but each has been limited in either the complexity of the models or the complexity of the images. We present a non-parametric multi-scale statistical model for images that can be used for recognition, image de-noising, and in a "generative mode" to synthesize high quality textures.
